column1: Moving words from the heart by @maddow. We need to do *everything* we can to stop the spread of Covid-19 and protect ourselves and our loved ones. This pandemic does not discriminate.   I'm praying for Susan's continued recovery.   Mask-up social distance and stay safe. https://t.co/wtGQEvgwH1

Not only are new Covid-19 cases rising hospitalizations are also rising in Pennsylvania.  We're all in this together – mask up social distance and avoid all non-essential travel and crowds to protect you *and* your loved ones 😷  #MaskUpMontco #StaySafe https://t.co/F97QwiIrvU

.@MontcoPA is offering free COVID-19 testing for people of all ages at six locations across the county. To get tested you *must* make an appointment 😷  Find testing site location hours of service and appointment registration here: https://t.co/caAiWCFnKf
Stop 9: Gwynedd Square Elementary School in Lansdale with Upper Dublin committee-person Allen!   Remember to mask up and social distance at the polls.   #Vote #MaskUpMONTCO https://t.co/TNbabIa9mn
“Healthcare is a right - this is especially clear during a pandemic like COVID-19. Healthcare including mental healthcare should be available to everyone.”
7. Million. Covid-19 Cases.   Still no real leadership or plan from Trump. Unbelievable. https://t.co/MGxOL3clgP
Social-distancing and mask wearing is essential for preventing the spread of coronavirus 😷  Let's mask-up Pennsylvania — and help save lives!  https://t.co/CRr263i40r

Thank you to @andersoncooper for recognizing loved ones we have lost to the COVID-19 pandemic including my beloved mother-in-law Joan Cunnane.   They were not nobodies. Their lives were important. And they are dearly missed. https://t.co/5Rrf1y9ajI

This event has been postponed until further notice since I will be returning to D.C. on 9/21 to speak on the House Floor about my COVID-19 stimulus payments bill.  We are working to find another date. Thank you everyone for your support & stay tuned! https://t.co/pt9S3V6kp1

Climate Change and COVID-19 are two of the biggest most urgent issues facing our nation currently.   We need a President who believes in science and will use it to lead our country moving forward. We need @JoeBiden.  #VoteForScience https://t.co/f6zifiTaUW
Trump covered up the danger of COVID-19  & has done nothing in the *7 months* since to help Americans.  We need to vote like our lives depend on it this November - because they do.
Let's keep our successful COVID-19 response up and cases down 💪  Remember to wear your mask and social distance this long weekend😷   https://t.co/5jIJLh5GmO

The US currently has over 6 million COVID cases and yet Trump has no plan to contain the virus or take care of the American people and provide relief to families that are still struggling.   We need real leadership - now more than ever.  https://t.co/LcjaIF1vu9

Happy Independent Bookstore Day! I had the pleasure of visiting Narberth Bookshop last week and discussing challenges facing small businesses during COVID.   To support check out these independent bookstores in PA-4  ➡️ @NarberthBooks  ➡️ @theblackreserve  ➡️ @TowneBookCenter https://t.co/FbN2AaypJB

Too many lives have already been lost needlessly to the COVID-19 pandemic because of Trump's incompetence and mismanagement.   @JoeBiden will turn this health crisis around. He protects Americans & brings his empathy for others to every aspect of his work.   #DemConvention

COVID-19 is disproportionately affecting Black communities - this is a result of decades of residential segregation inequity in healthcare & environmental racism.  To fight the pandemic we need to ensure Black communities have equal access to testing & healthcare.   #MaskUpPA https://t.co/qchSnW5K59

Trump has caused many needless deaths with his woeful mis-management of the COVID-19 pandemic.   We need a leader who believes in science. We need a leader who unites people and actually *leads* in a crisis. We need @JoeBiden  in the White House.   #BidenHarris2020 #DemConvention

I'm looking forward to returning to the House this week to pass much-needed funding for the USPS.   Let’s get the Senate back in town to pass this and another COVID relief bill that helps desperately struggling workers families and renters. https://t.co/lqwmAlcEWO

Let's wear our masks social distance and keep it up MONTCO! Thanks to @VAArk and @kenlawrencejr for their strong leadership in guiding our county. #MontcoStrong #WearAMaskSaveALife https://t.co/OmdDBUBDYd

A must read for students and teachers alike. Educators always rise to the occasion to inspire and engage—plus all proceeds go back to the students! Hats off to the Class of Covid-19 🎓 https://t.co/v8fGpqXKpE

Happy Birthday to a rockstar organizer and community leader @emmcooper42! I appreciate everything you’ve done for our community. I look forward to seeing you in person soon from a safe social distance.
